text: This is a list of academic journals about applied linguistics in English. *Applied Linguistics *Annual Review of Applied Linguistics *Issues in Applied Linguistics *Assessing Writing *Bilingualism: Language and Cognition *ITL - International Journal of Applied Linguistics *Journal of Child Language *Journal of Second Language Writing *Language Acquisition *Language Learning *Language Teaching *Language Teaching Research *Language Testing *The Modern Language Journal *Reading and Writing *System *TESOL Journal *TESOL Quarterly *Writing Systems Research Category:Linguistics journals
title: List of applied linguistics journals
